Text:
Once again - thank you so, so much for uploading this! You seem to be the only person uploading The Bridge with the proper BBC subs and I'm so grateful for your work. Plus I'm hooked already  - will you definitely be uploading the whole season as it comes to hand?

Oh, and finally, I like your description of the 'Scandinavian pace' - ha! :-)

Eps 5 + 6 now up - takes some time now due to being TPB being blocked here...

VPN on to upload torrent file - off for Utorrent - grrrrrr
